name: Dinner Tonight: Crunchy Raw Beetroot Salad with Feta and Pear
description: I was going to tie this beet salad in with the New York Times article "The 11 Best Foods You Aren't Eating", until my wife kindly reminded me the article was actually published in June, and that smart me had...
recipeIngredient: 4 beets, peeled and cut into matchsticks
3 pears, peeled, cored, and cut into matchsticks

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the lemon juice into a small bowl and slowly whisk in the oil.
Toss together the beets and pears in a large bowl. Pour the lemon dressing on top and mix until thoroughly coated. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Add the mint, sunflower seeds, and crumble on the feta. Serve.
